tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trade_time TIME NOT NULL,
    base_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    quote_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    trade_price DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    crypto_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 8),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_fees (
    fee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    fee_amount DECIMAL(18, 8),
    fee_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  currency_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(15, 5),
  transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE exchanges (
    exchange_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    website VARCHAR(255),
    regulatory_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
    cryptocurrency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    name VARCHAR(100),
    market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    from_address TEXT,
    to_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
);
